DataTable.description:
Row Expansion DataTable for YUI 2
Author: gelinase@yahoo-inc.com / Eric Gelinas

Row Expansion.name: YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable
Row Expansion.description:
Row Expansion DataTable for YUI 2
Author: gelinase@yahoo-inc.com / Eric Gelinas

DataTable.name: DataTable

YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable.name: YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable

params.name: aColumnDefs
params.description: Array of object literal Column definitions.

constructors.description:
The RowExpansionDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
functionality for expanding rows to show more contextual data.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange.name: beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange
beforeRowExpansionTemplateChange.description: Fires before the value for the configuration attribute 'rowExpansionTemplate' changes. Return false to cancel the attribute change.

params.name: event
params.description: An object containing the previous attribute value and the new value.

rowExpansionTemplateChange.name: rowExpansionTemplateChange
rowExpansionTemplateChange.description: Fires when the value for the configuration attribute 'rowExpansionTemplate' changes.

sortColumn.description:
With dynamic data, we cannot restore expanded rows because the
record id's are never the same.

onEventRestoreRowExpansion.description:
Abstract method which restores row expansion for subscribing to
the DataTable postRenderEvent.

collapseAllRows.description:
Collapses all expanded rows. This should be called before any
action where the row expansion markup would interfear with
normal DataTable markup handling. This method does not remove
exents attached during implementation. All event handlers should
be removed separately.

return.description: Reference to previous TD element, or null.

params.type:
HTMLElement | String | Object} DOM element reference or string ID, or
object literal of syntax {record:oRecord, column:oColumn
params.name: cell
params.description: from which to get previous TD element.

_getRecordState.description:
Gets state object for a specific record associated with the
DataTable.

params.name: key
params.description:
Key to return within the state object. Default is to
return all as a map

_setColumnWidth.description: Override to work around IE6 issue.

_setRecordState.description:
Sets a value to a state object with a unique id for a record
which is associated with the DataTable

params.name: value
params.description: Value to assign to the key

collapseRow.description: Sets the expansion state of a row to collapsed

toggleRowExpansion.description: Toggles the expansion state of a row

return.description: Reference to next TD element, or null.

params.type:
HTMLElement | String | Object} DOM element reference or string ID, or
object literal of syntax {record:oRecord, column:oColumn
params.name: cell
params.description: from which to get next TD element.

params.name: template
params.description:
a string template or function to be
called when Row is expanded

initRowExpansion.description: Initializes row expansion on the DataTable instance

params.name: value
params.description: Value to assign to the key

onEventToggleRowExpansion.description:
Abstract method which toggles row expansion for subscribing to
the DataTable postRenderEvent.

params.name: restore
params.description:
will restore an exisiting state for a
row that has been collapsed by a non user action

expandRow.description: Sets the expansion state of a row to expanded

onPaginatorChangeRequest.description:
With dynamic data, we cannot restore expanded rows because the
record id's are never the same.

YAHOO.widget.RowExpansionDataTable.description:
The RowExpansionDataTable class extends the DataTable class to provide
functionality for expanding rows to show more contextual data.
